home.summary: CS Student with a keen interest in artificial intelligence and web technologies. Currently a software engineering intern at Patricia

about.about: Ayodeji Akinola is currently an undergraduate student of Federal University Of Technology Akure Nigeria, currently studying computer science. He's an optimistic & pragmatic human who believes in kaizen and the act of building stuff's, He's enthusiastic about web technologies and has a keen interest for artificial intelligence. He enjoys solving problems, experimenting with new engineering concepts, diving into open source codebase and figuring out how stuff's work. In my spare time , i read/sleep/play video games and have fun
